articles.author: Kris Holt
articles.title: The USB-C Apple Pencil is cheaper than ever in this early Prime Day deal
articles.description: The USB-C Apple Pencil was already the most wallet-friendly version of the peripheral, and a new sale brings it back down to a record-low price.
articles.content: There are bargains aplenty to be had in the lead up to the October edition of Prime Day. Many are even bringing the prices of certain products down to record lows. Case in point: the USB-C Apple Penc… [+1490 chars]

articles.title: Apple’s rumored smart display may arrive in 2025 running new homeOS
articles.description: Bloomberg's Mark Gurman says there are two versions in the works: a low-end display that will offer the basics, like FaceTime and smart home controls, and...
articles.content:
Apple is planning to debut a new operating system called homeOS with its long-rumored smart displays, the first of which is expected to arrive as soon as 2025, according to Bloomberg
s Mark Gurman. … [+917 chars]

articles.author: Rachael O'Connor
articles.title: Tourist Asks for the Menu Abroad, Can't Cope With What They Get Instead
articles.description: Niklas Ekstedt from Sweden told Newsweek that, "instead of coming back with menus, the server returned with two apple strudels."
articles.content:
Members of a family who decided to try speaking the local language while on vacation quickly learned their skills weren't as solid as they hoped.
Niklas Ekstedt, 45 and from Stockholm in Sweden, was… [+3634 chars]

articles.author: Matthew Fox
articles.title: Nvidia market cap surpasses Apple, now world's 2nd-most-valuable company
articles.description: The chip maker powering the AI boom has turned into one of the world's most valuable companies.
articles.content:
Nvidia surged 5% on Wednesday to become the second-most-valuable company in the world, surpassing Apple.
The stock closed at $1,224.40 per share, giving it a market valuation of $3.014 trillion.
Th… [+1654 chars]

articles.author: Alex Wilhelm
articles.title: Watch: When did iPads get as expensive as MacBooks?
articles.description: Would you switch out your MacBook for an iPad with an M4 chip and OLED display? With the increase in price, Apple seems to be arguing these are comparable but we’re curious to see if consumers will make the change.
articles.content: Apple’s iPad event had a lot to like. New iPads with new chips and new sizes, a new Apple Pencil, and even some software updates. If you are a big fan of Apple hardware, well, it was probably a good … [+1385 chars]

articles.title: Warren Buffett vende ações da Apple e explica por que reduziu fatia em 13%
articles.description: Participação na gigante de tecnologia passou a US$ 135 bilhões em março; números foram divulgados antes da reunião anual, neste sábado (4)
articles.content: O conglomerado do megainvestidor Warren Buffett, Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.B), vendeu US$ 38,9 bilhões em ações da Apple (AAPL) entre dezembro do ano passado e março deste ano. Os números foram revelad… [+2530 chars]

articles.author: GQ
articles.title: Apple Neuheiten: Was wir vor der ersten Keynote 2021 wissen!
articles.description: Bald soll es so weit sein: Bei der ersten Keynote 2021 präsentiert Apple Neues aus Cupertino. Auf diese Produkte dürfen wir uns freuen!
articles.content: Auf eines ist im Frühjahr immer Verlass: Apple präsentiert seine (ersten) neuen Produkte. Glauben wir den jüngsten Gerüchten, wird das auch 2021 so sein und dieses Jahr sogar wieder live aus Cupertin… [+2936 chars]
